span.p: Attention Parents: Final Forms is now OPEN for 2020-21 School Year! See article in News and Announcements for Step-by-Step Instructions! EVERYONE needs to complete the TRANSPORTATION INFORMATION FORM by May 1st! Some forms require student signatures (middle and high school students only)!

div.div:
Superintendent's Message
Welcome to Buckeye Central Local Schools “Where STUDENTS come FIRST!” The BC TEAM keeps each student at the center of daily instruction, experiences, and actions. Every team member provides their absolute best and believes there are no limits regarding our students' personal and academic growth and achievement.
Our district Vision, Mission, and Beliefs chart our path to ...
Read More
Mark Robinson

div.p: Buckeye Central Schools parents and students... As you know by now, Governor DeWine closed Ohio schools for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year this past Monday. Since his announcement (and even before), we have been working diligently to address the many end-of-the-year topics that must be handled. We will be sharing information regarding graduation, finalizing school work, locker clean out, Chromebooks and all other pertinent year-end information within the next couple of weeks. Be assured that we are working hard on plans to conduct a memorable graduation ceremony for our Seniors 2020. Thank you for your patience and support during these challenging and unprecedented times. The minute we are able to finalize our plans, you will be the first to know! Stay healthy and safe. BC_Strong!
